mapper.select: SELECT R.*, DATE_FORMAT(O.ORDERDATE, '%y-%m-%d') AS orderDate, O.*, D.*, M.* FROM FOOD114_REVIEW R INNER JOIN FOOD114_ORDER_DETAIL D ON R.ORDERNO = D.ORDERNO INNER JOIN FOOD114_ORDERS O ON O.ORDERNO = D.ORDERNO INNER JOIN FOOD114_MENU M ON D.MENUNO = M.MENUNO WHERE M.BIZID = #{bizId}
